<page title>: New Allen Bradley 2711P T7C4D2 A 2011 PanelView Plus 700 Touch Etnet 128MB | eBay
description: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T7C4D2 PanelView Plus 700 Color Terminal 6.5 inch, Touch Screen, Standard Communication (Ethernet and RS-232), 128 MB Flash, 128 MB RAM, DC power, Series A
miscellaneous: The Allen Bradley 2711P-T7C4D2 terminals use additional modular components allowing for flexible configuration, installation, and upgrades. The field replaceable 6.5-inch flat-panel color displays come with keypad, analog touch screen, or keypad/touch screen input. To meet more stringent environmental conditions, high-bright, conformal-coated, and marine certified display modules are also available.
specifications: Display Description: Color Active Matrix TFT; Display Size: 6.5 inch; Resolution: 640 x 480, 18-bit Color Graphics; Touch Screen Description: Analog resistive; Communication Ports: Ethernet, RS-232, 2 USB; Input Voltage, DC: 18-32V DC (24V DC nominal).
